column2: meas_other$compiled_answer <- ifelse((meas_other$compiled_answer == "Very unlikely" | meas_other$compiled_answer == "Very unimportant"), "Very low", ifelse((meas_other$compiled_answer == "Somewhat unlikely" | meas_other$compiled_answer == "Somewhat unimportant"), "Somewhat low", ifelse((meas_other$compiled_answer == "Somewhat likely" | meas_other$compiled_answer == "Somewhat important"), "Somewhat high", ifelse((meas_other$compiled_answer == "Very likely" | meas_other$compiled_answer == "Very important"), "Very high", meas_other$compiled_answer))))
labs(#title="Partipicants rated simpler metrics at the\nnode and graph level most important.",
